Tin Toy

Metal shaders made easy

Intro

Based upon shadertoy.com, Tin Toy allows for the easy creation and experimentation of shaders using Apple Metal on macOS.

Example Shaders

  • Rain
  • Plasma ball
  • Warp
  • Zebra-valley
  • Ascii renderer
